locations.Name: Hoyts
locations.Description: Cinema chain offering blockbusters and indie films, plus kids' programs and live music screenings.

locations.Name: Aquarium
locations.Address: King St & Flinders St, Melbourne VIC 3000
locations.Description: Interactive multilevel aquarium housing 10,000+ animals, including sharks & saltwater crocodiles.

locations.Name: Crown Complex
locations.Description: Crown Melbourne restaurants are considered to be some of the best in the world, and with 29 to choose from, even the fussiest foodie will be spoilt for choice. From a mouthwatering food court to fine dining experiences, whatever your taste, you’ll find it at Crown on Melbourne's Southbank.

locations.Name: ACMI
locations.Description: Noteworthy institution celebrating film, television and gaming with exhibits, screenings and events.
